name: The Onyx Crown
description:
Long ago, a magical kingdom ruled over the land. Lead by the beloved King and Queen, the people felt safe. Together, they ruled under a crown of black, and red stones. 

        And then- in an instant- everything changed.

The evil curse of the crown had begun to take over the land. No one was safe, not even the King and Queen. Nothing could stop its spread. And just like a bad dream, it was gone. Or so you thought...

*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:

Having awoken to a corrupted future, a Princess travels through her broken kingdom in search of a relic that could send her home, The Onyx Crown.

During your journey, you will use mythical relics to aid in your search and protect you from the stone creatures that have come to life.

*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:

Lamenting Lyre: When the Princess plays the Song of Sorrows, she is able to stun the Corrupted, allowing her safe passage from them temporarily.

King's Spectacles: The glasses worn by her Father, the King. Wearing them will allow the Princess to see the Shattered- hidden enemies that kill in with just one-touch. By making them visible temporarily, they are no longer a threat to the player.

Umbra's Cape:  By activating the cape, the Princess becomes invincible to the damaging red light of the Eggs. This ability will not keep her safe from the Corrupted or the Shattered.

*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:.,.:*:

  They are not her only threat, however, as the Mother is the source of all these creatures, and she stalks the castle in search of her prey.

FIND THE CROWN. RETURN TO YOUR TIME.
